result.arabic_text: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ لَئِنِ ٱتَّبَعۡتُمۡ شُعَيۡبًا إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ
result.translation: Abarongoye abagararije bagahakana isengwa ry’Imana Imwe Rudende Allah mu bantu ba Shu’ayibu, bavuze bagabisha ku gukurikira Shu’ayibu, bati: “Nimwaramuka mukurikiye Shu’ayibu, mu vy’ukuri muzoba muri mu ruhombo”.
